Kathy Griffin is home from the hospital following a major surgery in which half of her left lung was removed after she was diagnosed with stage one cancer.

articles.author: Rachel Sharp, Associated
articles.title: Meghan McCain is joined by mom Cindy as she bids farewell to The View after four years - Daily Mail
articles.description: McCain, 36, made her final appearance as host of the chat show Friday where she described her time as a 'wild ride' and jokingly apologized to producer Brian Teta 'for making his blood pressure rise'.
articles.content:
Meghan McCain was joined by her mom Cindy as she bid farewell to ABC's The View after four years, telling her co-hosts she will 'cherish' the time they spent together on the show.
